content: I'm considering getting a smart scale to track my weight and body fat percentage. I've been doing some research and reading reviews, and I think I might splurge on a Withings scale soon. By the way, I've been taking good care of my teeth with my Philips Sonicare electric toothbrush, which I've been using twice a day for about a year now. Do you think a smart scale can help me with tracking my overall health metrics?
